name: mysoundjourney
description: Visualize your listening history and get in tune with yourself.

scripts.fullbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && echo "mySoundJourney React frontend built." && npm start
scripts.fullrun: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && echo "mySoundJourney React frontend built." && npm start
scripts.heroku-prebuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && echo "mySoundJourney React frontend built."

author: Sanjay Alwani
